name: Picture Larson Tech Hoodie - Men's
description:
A teched out hoodie helps keep you cool when you’re working hard. It dries quickly and wicks away moisture. Anatomical patterning prevents bunching or binding when you on the move.Body mapped construction offers a great range of movement.Dry feel antimicrobial treatment.Dry Now STD underarm panels rapidly wick away moisture.Thumb holes.Picture was established with the goal of creating inspiring outdoor clothing that helps us reduce our dependence on fossil fuels. Picture believes in 100% transparency and uses factories that are part of the Fair Wear Foundation.

        Sustainability
